comments.body: You may also need to assert that `store2` doesn't contains `blockId` as you did previously.

@Ngone51 Previously I was asserting a) store1 and store3 has block present and b) store2 doesn't have block present.

But now we are asking master endpoint to give us all locations of block and we are expecting it to be [store1, store3]. So both a) and b) are asserted together here and so we don't need to assert store2 doesn't have block explicitly.
